mapper.select: select emp_ix,emp_commute_ix,worktime,leavetime,workday,state from emp_commute_tb where emp_ix=#{emp_ix} order by workday desc
mapper.insert: insert into emp_change_tb values( emp_change_tb_seq.nextval, #{emp_commute_ix}, #{emp_ix}, #{c_worktime}, #{c_leavetime}, #{title}, #{reason}, #{progress}, null )
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select a.emp_commute_ix , a.emp_ix, a.worktime, a.leavetime, a.workday, a.daytime, a.state, b.emp_change_ix, b.c_worktime, b.c_leavetime, b.title, b.reason, b.progress, b.c_return from emp_commute_tb a,emp_change_tb b where a.emp_ix = b.emp_ix and a.emp_commute_ix = b.emp_commute_ix and a.emp_ix=#{emp_ix} order by emp_change_ix desc)a)b where rnum>=((#{cp}-1)*#{listsize}+1) and rnum<=#{cp}*#{listsize}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select e.emp_ix,e.e_name,e.e_position, c.emp_commute_ix,c.workday,c.worktime,NVL(c.leavetime,'-') as leavetime,c.state from emp_tb e, emp_commute_tb c where e.emp_ix=c.emp_ix and e.man_ix=41 and c.workday=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))a)b where rnum>=((#{cp}-1)*#{listsize}+1) and rnum<=#{cp}*#{listsize}
select count(emp_commute_ix) as total from emp_tb e,emp_commute_tb eco where workday=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and e.emp_ix=eco.emp_ix and e.man_ix=#{man_ix}
select e.emp_ix, e.e_name, ecom.worktime,ecom.leavetime,ecom.workday,ecom.emp_commute_ix,ecom.state from emp_tb e, emp_commute_tb ecom where e.emp_ix = ecom.emp_ix and e.man_ix=#{man_ix}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select e.emp_ix, e.e_name, ecom.worktime,ecom.leavetime,ecom.workday,ecom.emp_commute_ix, ech.emp_change_ix,ech.c_worktime,ech.c_leavetime,ech.title, ech.reason,ech.progress,ech.c_return from emp_tb e, emp_commute_tb ecom, emp_change_tb ech where ech.emp_ix = e.emp_ix and ech.emp_commute_ix = ecom.emp_commute_ix and e.man_ix=#{man_ix} order by emp_change_ix desc)a)b where rnum>=((#{cp}-1)*#{listsize}+1) and rnum<=#{cp}*#{listsize}
select count(emp_change_ix) as total from emp_tb e,emp_change_tb ech,man_tb m where e.emp_ix=ech.emp_ix and e.man_ix=m.man_ix and m.man_ix=#{man_ix}
